Title: Relates to rates of reimbursement for telehealth services
Summary: Relates to rates of reimbursement for telehealth services; requires insurers to  reimburse telehealth providers at the same rate as they would if the services had been provided in person.
LawCode: Amd §§2999-dd & 4406-g, Pub Health L; amd §§3217-h & 4306-g, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the insurance law, in relation to rates of reimbursement for telehealth services
